discussion.title: weight_optimize not a valid argument for regressor
discussion.body:
When I try and set the weight_optimize parameter I get the 
TypeError: weight_optimize is not a valid keyword argument for PySRRegressor.
The regressor should update automatically I thought, in case this should be a version issue. But yes, I am curious if others are able to set this parameter. Especially since I want to use a large ncyclesperiteration.
